name: Zand's Labyrinth
overview: Game description: Zand's Labyrinth is a German arcade maze game, sort of a mix of Snake and Pac-Man. You play as a snake who has to eat whatever the level you are in has to offer. A worm, which can be controlled by either the computer or a human player, "lays" new stuff you have to eat before you can exit the level. The more you eat, the longer you become.
